topic.title: Appendix D Consequential amendments to IFRS 1 First-time Adoption of International Financial Reporting Standards

note.p: This appendix sets out an amendment to IFRS 1 First-time Adoption of International Financial Reporting Standards that is a consequence of the IASB issuing IFRS 14. An entity shall apply the amendment for annual periods beginning on or after 1 January 2016. Earlier application is permitted. If an entity applies IFRS 14 for an earlier period, the amendment shall be applied for that earlier period.

p.i: The amendment contained in this appendix when this IFRS was issued in 2014 has been incorporated into the text of IFRS 1 published in this volume.
